magnetite-info.before-level-info: the material that you are looking for is magnetite, which is crucial for the magnetic correction system in our machine. magnetite's properties may affect technology crucial to this mission and others to come. please note that you will land at night, so you will need to use your flashlights
magnetite-info.after-level-info: you've found the magnetite! on the way back make sure not to touch any parts of the odyssey, because as far as our sources tell us, it is contaminated. this is an order, not a request.
